snippet: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes hopes to end the year on a high as the side prepare for trips to the Premier League's top-two teams boosted by the return of winger Ibrahim Afellay....
lead_paragraph: Stoke City manager Mark Hughes hopes to end the year on a high as the side prepare for trips to the Premier League's top-two teams boosted by the return of winger Ibrahim Afellay.

headline.main: Stoke Hoping to Leave Top-Two Nursing Festive Hangovers
headline.print_headline: Stoke Hoping to Leave Top-Two Nursing Festive Hangovers
